thread.title: Best ETFs: Small- and Mid-Cap Funds
thread.title_full: Best ETFs: Small- and Mid-Cap Funds

author: William Baldwin
title: Best ETFs: Small- and Mid-Cap Funds
text:
Five of these exchange-traded funds have the special distinction of providing money management at negative cost. The revenue they haul in by lending shares to short-sellers more than covers their overhead.Among the cost winners are two in BlackRockâ€™s iShares family: Russell 2000 ( IWM ) and Russell 2000 Growth ( IWO ), and one each from Schwab ( U.S. Small-Cap , SCHA ), Vanguard ( Small-Cap Growth , VBK ) and State Street ( SPDR Russell 2000, TWOK ).Rules for the Best ETFs scorecard, and links to 13 categories of funds, can be found here .
